0: We were both young when I first saw you
I close my eyes and the flashback starts
On a balcony in summer air
1: See the lights, see the party
See you make your way through the crowd
2: And I was crying on the staircase
3: All there is left to do is run
And I will be the princess
4: So I sneak out to the garden to see you
We keep quiet cause we are dead if they knew
Escape this town for a little while
5: But you were everything to me
6: All there is left to do is run
And I will be the princess
7: They are trying to tell me how to feel
We will make it out of this mess
8: Wondering if you were ever coming around
My faith in you is fading
When I met you on the outskirts of town
9: I have been feeling so alone
I dont know what to think
He knelt to the ground and pulled out a ring
10: You will never have to be alone
I love you and that is all I really know
You will pick out a white dress
11: We were both young when I first saw you
